title: What requires for the scholarships ?
content:
I wanted to know the benchmark(GPA) for the scholarship given to the top 25 percent Students from every campus to every branch Students separately specially for EC campus CSE . 

Is it good to focus on scholarship

comments.body: It is separate for each campus. In your first year it is given on the basis of cycle (Phy and Chem both separate) but from second year onwards it is given on a department basis.
one semester in the first year depending on which 5 credit course you have (physics/chemistry)
Very easy if u are in ec, just get above 8.5 youll be in top 20 percent
does the scholarship amount change for students in EC? I heard there were some differences between scholarships at RR and EC, but not sure exactly what they are.
Any Idea for other colleges like RVCE, PESU RR??
